description:
Crowdfunding has become an innovative way to get funding for everything from social causes, business start-ups, and personal matters. It uses the ability to generate interest so that like minded individuals come together to make a campaign successful.

People have used crowdfunding as a way to enhance aspects of their career. Authors, musicians, business owners, and artists have been using crowdfunding with success. It has become a way to generate money away from restrictive financial institutions. Now individuals can use their creativity, message, and relationships to get funding instead of their credit score.

This course shows how to use the power of the crowd to help your career. 19 lectures include identifying aspects of your career that you want to develop, basics of crowdfunding, and what to do when the campaign is over.

Crowdfunding is revolutionizing the areas of financing and investing. It can also help revolutionize the work you do.
title: Crowdfund Your Career : Use Crowdfunding For Your Career
